content.en: Adaptive filtering: Researchers have been investigating the performance of various algorithms in different applications such as system identification and acoustic echo cancellation. The agency attributed to these algorithms is the improvement of adaptive filters in different environments, including scenarios with impulsive interferences and impulsive noise. These algorithms aim to enhance convergence rate, steady-state error, robustness against outliers and impulsive noise, and filtering performance, ultimately leading to better solutions and improved understanding of their behavior.
content.da: Adaptiv filtrering: Forskere har undersøgt ydelsen af forskellige algoritmer i forskellige applikationer såsom systemidentifikation og akustisk ekkofjernelse. Den forbedring, der tilskrives disse algoritmer, er forbedringen af adaptive filtre i forskellige miljøer, herunder scenarier med impulsive forstyrrelser og impulsiv støj. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre konvergenshastighed, steady-state fejl, robusthed mod outliers og impulsiv støj samt filtreringsydelse, hvilket i sidste ende fører til bedre løsninger og forbedret forståelse af deres adfærd.
